document_data.name: Hyrzashyr
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hyrzashyr''' was a short river in [[Amn]].
document_data.Geography: The Hyrzashyr flowed north from the [[Tejarn Hills]] into [[Lake Esmel]].
document_data.History: The river received its name during the time of the [[halfling]] kingdom of [[Meiritin]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The fishing village of [[Zinner]] was found along the banks of this river.
